description: Situated within a palazzo full of history, from the medieval basement to the Renaissance-style architecture of the restaurant itself, Locale is also home to an old courtyard with a lounge bar and large cocktail counter, as well as some beautiful rooms to the rear of the building. Enjoy creative, innovative cuisine with personalised touches influenced by the chef’s professional experience around the world (Australia, Japan, France). Our inspector particularly enjoyed the Risoni pasta with cuttlefish liver and cherry tomatoes.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Interesting wine list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus']
